author: Dr. Vinayak Kumar
title: COVID-19 has been compared to the flu. Experts say that's wrong.
description: The novel coronavirus appears more deadly and spreads more quickly than the flu, experts said.
content:
Even with businesses closed, travel restricted and shelter-in-place orders issued around the world, many still wonder if such extremes are needed to battle the novel coronavirus.
Some people, including the president of the United States, have said COVID-19 i… [+3483 chars]
